description: Supporters say the case against Kirill Serebrennikov is aimed at muzzling the arts in Russia.
title: Kirill Serebrennikov: Russian film and stage director convicted of fraud
title_page: Kirill Serebrennikov: Russian film and stage director convicted of fraud - BBC News
maintext: The film and stage director, a well-known critic of arts censorship in Russia, was greeted by a crowd of well-wishers as he arrived for his court hearing on Friday. He and many others wore face masks to protect against the coronavirus.
